item.title: What books are suitable for audiobooks?
item.description: Recently I’ve been thinking about what books are most suitable for audiobooks. First, a bit of context for why audiobooks. A few steps of logical deduction: There are times during the day at which my limbs are occupied but my brain isn’t. Examples are while driving, working out, boiling noodles, etc. My time is precious and I’d like to spend it on effective output or input. At most times above, output is difficult, so information input makes more sense.
